backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining data types and storage for artists, jobs, gigs, bookings, and products, with mixins for authorization and blob storage, plus CRUD operations for each entity type.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five main features (artist profiles, job marketplace, gigs marketplace, booking system, product store) with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary of frontend files including App.tsx with routing, useQueries.ts with React Query hooks, Layout with navigation, and payment/cart pages with Stripe integration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Artist Connect application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component configuring TanStack Router with routes for artists, jobs, gigs, bookings, store, cart, and profile pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with sticky header navigation, Internet Identity authentication controls, shopping cart indicator, and footer with social media links.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Placeholder component for user profile setup dialog that is currently disabled since backend user profile methods are not available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Defines a Zustand store for shopping cart state management with persistence, supporting adding/removing items, updating quantities, and calculating totals for products and gigs.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including artist profiles, job offerings, services, bookings, products, and Stripe configuration using the actor from useActor hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme color schemes using warm earth tones, plus utility classes for gallery grids and artistic shadows.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root React component wrapped with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistProfilePage.tsx: Displays a detailed artist profile page with portfolio gallery and available services, fetching data by artist ID from route parameters with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistsListPage.tsx: Renders a grid gallery of all artist profiles with portfolio previews, skills badges, and links to individual artist pages, including loading skeletons and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/BookingsPage.tsx: Shows a list of all user bookings with details like service type, date, time, and duration, displaying a placeholder when no bookings exist.
frontend/src/pages/BookServicePage.tsx: Displays an artist's profile and available services for booking, with navigation back to the artist profile and buttons to select date/time for each service.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page that displays cart items with quantity controls, calculates totals, and initiates Stripe checkout sessions for purchase.
frontend/src/pages/GigDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information about a specific gig including title, description, pricing, and delivery time, with a button to book via Stripe checkout.
frontend/src/pages/GigsPage.tsx: Displays a marketplace of creative gigs with the ability for authenticated users to create new gigs via a dialog form with title, description, pricing, and delivery time fields.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section and feature cards highlighting the platform's capabilities for artists including profiles, gigs, bookings, and store functionality.
frontend/src/pages/JobOfferingDetailPage: Displays detailed information for a single job offering including title, budget, deadline, and description, with options to navigate back or apply. Handles loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/JobOfferingsPage.tsx: Lists all job offerings with filtering/browsing capabilities and provides a dialog for authenticated users to create new job postings with title, description, budget, and deadline fields.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Allows authenticated artists to create and manage their profile including bio, skills, contact info, and portfolio images with upload progress tracking. Requires login to access.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment failure message with error icon and provides navigation options to return to cart or home page.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows payment success confirmation, clears the shopping cart on mount, and provides navigation to home or store pages.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed product information with image, price, and description, allowing users to add the item to cart or navigate back to store. Handles loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/StorePage.tsx: Lists all products in a grid with add-to-cart functionality and provides authenticated users a dialog to create new products with image upload, title, description, and price.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and methods to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, typography with Inter and Playfair Display fonts, custom animations, and artistic shadow effects for the artist platform UI.
project_state.json: Project state document describing an online artist marketplace platform with features for profiles, job postings, gigs, bookings, product store, and Stripe payment integration, using warm creative aesthetics with earth tones.
